thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Tech Tremors
The clobbering of technology shares in recent days is magnifying not only how influential these companies have become in people’s lives, but how much sway they now command in global markets. Investors are concerned that the rapid growth of tech giants in recent years has led to outsize influence, and that the sector’s sharp reversal leaves them susceptible to greater downside. Combined, the five largest U.S. tech and internet companies account for more than 14% of the S&P 500 index’s weighting.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
